channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16089] Add on FastPath for CoDel
item.description: If this is all that awesome, so we should have it on CoDel too.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: should be a subtask of this umbrella

-1 overall

Let me post a picture... but the short circuit doesn't seem to be cutting in:


2457 "RpcServer.reader=3,bindAddress=ve0528.halxg.cloudera.com,port=16020" #36 daemon prio=5 os_prio=0 tid=0x00007f00a592f800 nid=0x206e0 waiting on condition [0x00007ef88730a000]

2458    java.lang.Thread.State: WAITING (parking)

2459   at sun.misc.Unsafe.park(Native Method)

2460   - parking to wait for  <0x00007ef9a24d93a8> (a java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock$NonfairSync)

2461   at java.util.concurrent.locks.LockSupport.park(LockSupport.java:175)

2462   at java.util.concurrent.locks.AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.parkAndCheckInterrupt(AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.java:836)

2463   at java.util.concurrent.locks.AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.acquireQueued(AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.java:870)

2464   at java.util.concurrent.locks.AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.acquire(AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.java:1199)

2465   at java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock$NonfairSync.lock(ReentrantLock.java:209)

2466   at java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock.lock(ReentrantLock.java:285)

2467   at java.util.concurrent.LinkedBlockingDeque.size(LinkedBlockingDeque.java:807)

2468   at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.AdaptiveLifoCoDelCallQueue.size(AdaptiveLifoCoDelCallQueue.java:199)

2469   at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.BalancedQueueRpcExecutor.dispatch(BalancedQueueRpcExecutor.java:88)

2470   at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.SimpleRpcScheduler.dispatch(SimpleRpcScheduler.java:296)

2471   at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.RpcServer$Connection.processRequest(RpcServer.java:1942)

2472   at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.RpcServer$Connection.processOneRpc(RpcServer.java:1833)

2473   at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.RpcServer$Connection.process(RpcServer.java:1679)

2474   at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.RpcServer$Connection.readAndProcess(RpcServer.java:1659)

2475   at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.RpcServer$Listener.doRead(RpcServer.java:907)

2476   at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.RpcServer$Listener$Reader.doRunLoop(RpcServer.java:689)

2477   - locked <0x00007ef9a21de7d0> (a org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.RpcServer$Listener$Reader)

2478   at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.RpcServer$Listener$Reader.run(RpcServer.java:665)

2479   at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142)

2480   at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617)

2481   at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)

Three peaks in the image are current state of branch-1 (fifo), then branch-1 with 'codel' enabled followed by 'codel' + patch. It shows some improvement but not much... stack tracing, the fast path doesn't seem to be cutting in ... much.

Looking at the patch, where is the alternate dispatch happening where we do the short-circuit...i.e. from FifoWith...Executor.java


 59   @Override

 60   public boolean dispatch(CallRunner callTask) throws InterruptedException {

 61     FastPathHandler handler = popReadyHandler();

 62     return handler != null? handler.loadCallRunner(callTask): super.dispatch(callTask);

 63   }
The stack you posted seems to be using BalancedQueueRpcExecutor rather than FastPathBalancedQueueRpcExecutor. FifoWith became FastPathBalancedQueueRpcExecutor.
Hmmm that seems strange. Let me check here.
Changed the names of threads so it would be more noticible that the FastPath is being used.

The latest patch seems to be working (We go from just over 200k/second to 335k/second. YMMV.).

I caught an instance of fastpath:


2572 "RpcServer.reader=0,bindAddress=ve0528.halxg.cloudera.com,port=16020" #33 daemon prio=5 os_prio=0 tid=0x00007f0bc582e000 nid=0x1141 runnable [0x00007f03a97ea000]

I'd set this property.
310 <property>$
311 <name>$
312 hbase.ipc.server.callqueue.type$
313 </name>$
314 <value>codel</value>$
315 </property>$
Here is graph with v3 of patch hump on the extreme right. The left hand side includes the three humps of the graph already loaded.
Patch looks good to me.
Thanks Stack that's awesome. Still a little lower than fifo ( but I think that's to be expected ).
Pushed to master, branch-1, and branch-1.3

Elliott Clark do you remember why this change was made to the default target delay?

https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12813161/HBASE-16089.v3.patch

from

public static final int CALL_QUEUE_CODEL_DEFAULT_TARGET_DELAY = 5;

tp

public static final int CALL_QUEUE_CODEL_DEFAULT_TARGET_DELAY = 100;
